mapper.sql: MENU_CD /*메뉴코드 */ , MENU_NM /*메뉴명 */ , MENU_URL /*메뉴URL */ , TOP_MENU_CD /*최상위메뉴코드 */ , PRNTS_MENU_CD /*부모메뉴코드 */ , MENU_LVL_NO /*메뉴레벨번호 */ , MENU_ODRG /*메뉴순번 */ , MENU_ICON_CD /*메뉴아이콘코드 */ , MENU_AUTH_YN /*메뉴권한여부 */ , MENU_SHOW_YN /*메뉴노출여부 */ , MENU_POPUP_YN /*메뉴팝업여부 */ , MENU_POPUP_WDTH_LEN /*메뉴팝업가로길이 */ , MENU_POPUP_VRTC_LEN /*메뉴팝업세로길이 */ , MENU_EXPLN /*메뉴설명 */ , CHNG_LOG_YN /*변경로그여부 */ , USE_YN /*사용여부 */ , REGR_ID /*등록자ID */ , REG_DT /*등록일시 */ , AMDR_ID /*수정자ID */ , AMD_DT /*수정일시 */
mapper.select:
SELECT , 'Y' MENU_REG_AUTH_YN , 'Y' MENU_READ_AUTH_YN , 'Y' MENU_AMD_AUTH_YN , 'Y' MENU_DEL_AUTH_YN , ( SELECT LISTAGG(MENU_NM, '>') WITHIN GROUP(ORDER BY MENU_LVL_NO) FROM CRM_MENU_BAS WHERE 1=1 START WITH MENU_CD = A.MENU_CD CONNECT BY PRIOR PRNTS_MENU_CD = MENU_CD ) MENU_PATH FROM CRM_MENU_BAS A
ORDER BY MENU_LVL_NO , MENU_ODRG , MENU_CD
SELECT , 'Y' MENU_REG_AUTH_YN , 'Y' MENU_READ_AUTH_YN , 'Y' MENU_AMD_AUTH_YN , 'Y' MENU_DEL_AUTH_YN FROM CRM_MENU_BAS

SELECT MAX(MENU_CD) MENU_CD , MAX(MENU_ODRG) MENU_ODRG FROM CRM_MENU_BAS WHERE 1=1
AND MENU_LVL_NO = 1
AND PRNTS_MENU_CD = #{menuCd}
AND MENU_LVL_NO = 1

SELECT MENU_CD , MENU_NM , MENU_URL , PRNTS_MENU_CD , TOP_MENU_CD , MENU_LVL_NO , MENU_ODRG , MENU_SHOW_YN , MENU_ICON_CD , MENU_AUTH_YN , MENU_POPUP_YN , MENU_POPUP_WDTH_LEN , MENU_POPUP_VRTC_LEN , MENU_EXPLN , USE_YN , REGR_ID , REG_DT , AMDR_ID , AMD_DT , CHNG_LOG_YN , 'Y' MENU_REG_AUTH_YN , 'Y' MENU_READ_AUTH_YN , 'Y' MENU_AMD_AUTH_YN , 'Y' MENU_DEL_AUTH_YN FROM CRM_MENU_BAS A
ORDER BY MENU_ODRG , MENU_CD

WITH GRP_USR AS ( SELECT GRP_CD, USER_CD FROM CRM_GRP_USER_REL UNION ALL SELECT GRP_CD, EMP_ID FROM CRM_GRP_EMP_REL UNION ALL SELECT GRP_CD, EMP_ID FROM ( SELECT A.ORG_ID , B.GRP_CD FROM CRM_ORG_BAS A , CRM_GRP_ORG_REL B START WITH B.ORG_ID = A.ORG_ID CONNECT BY PRIOR A.ORG_ID = A.UP_ORG_ID ) A , CRM_EMP_BAS B WHERE A.ORG_ID = B.ORG_ID ) SELECT A.* , B.MENU_REG_AUTH_YN , B.MENU_READ_AUTH_YN , B.MENU_AMD_AUTH_YN , B.MENU_DEL_AUTH_YN FROM ( SELECT A.MENU_CD , A.MENU_NM , A.MENU_URL , A.PRNTS_MENU_CD , A.TOP_MENU_CD , A.MENU_LVL_NO , A.MENU_ODRG , A.MENU_SHOW_YN , A.MENU_ICON_CD , A.MENU_AUTH_YN , A.MENU_POPUP_YN , A.MENU_POPUP_WDTH_LEN , A.MENU_POPUP_VRTC_LEN , A.MENU_EXPLN , A.USE_YN , A.REGR_ID , A.REG_DT , A.AMDR_ID , A.AMD_DT , A.CHNG_LOG_YN , DECODE(B.MENU_CD , NULL,'N','Y') WDGT_YN FROM CRM_MENU_BAS A LEFT JOIN CRM_USER_WDGT_BAS B ON A.MENU_CD = B.MENU_CD AND B.USER_CD = #{userCd} WHERE TOP_MENU_CD = #{topMenuCd} AND USE_YN = 'Y' AND ( A.MENU_AUTH_YN = 'N' OR A.MENU_CD IN (SELECT MENU_CD FROM CRM_GRP_MENU_REL WHERE GRP_CD IN (SELECT GRP_CD FROM GRP_USR WHERE USER_CD = #{userCd})) OR A.MENU_URL IS NULL OR A.MENU_LVL_NO = 1 ) ) A , ( SELECT MAX (MENU_REG_AUTH_YN) MENU_REG_AUTH_YN , MAX (MENU_READ_AUTH_YN) MENU_READ_AUTH_YN , MAX (MENU_AMD_AUTH_YN) MENU_AMD_AUTH_YN , MAX (MENU_DEL_AUTH_YN) MENU_DEL_AUTH_YN , MENU_CD FROM GRP_USR GU , CRM_GRP_MENU_REL GM WHERE GU.GRP_CD = GM.GRP_CD AND GU.USER_CD = #{userCd} GROUP BY MENU_CD ) B WHERE A.MENU_CD = B.MENU_CD(+) ORDER BY A.TOP_MENU_CD, A.MENU_LVL_NO, A.MENU_ODRG
